Question: A year and a half later, this person gave birth to their second child, Desiderio Alberto Arnaz IV, known as Desi Arnaz, Jr.
Hints: In 1977, this person was among the first recipients of the Women in Film Crystal Award.
In 1951, this person was instrumental in the creation of the television series I Love Lucy.
This person was dubbed the "Queen of the Bs" (referring to her many roles in B-films).
